description:
Aplikácia slúži pre predplatiteľov Denníka N na pohodlné a praktické čítanie článkov v  smartfóne. Ponúka:
- rýchle načítanie článkov bez reklamy
- ukladanie článkov na neskôr so synchronizáciou s webom 
- čítanie bez pripojenia k internetu
- upozornenia na zaujímavé články podľa tém a autorov, ktoré vás zaujímajú 
- pehrávanie podcastov s možnosťou počúvania bez pripojenia k internetu
- osobná titulná stránka s najnovšími článkami od autorov a na témy, ktoré vás zaujímajú   
- vyhľadávanie
- odomykanie článkov pre priateľov (predplatné Klub)
- tmavý a svetlý režim, úprava veľkosti písma

Aplikácia je k dispozícii zadarmo, dočítať články do konca však môžu iba existujúci predplatitelia Denníka N alebo čitatelia, ktorí si kúpia predplatné cez aplikáciu. 

Existujúci predplatitelia Denníka N môžu čítať celé články v aplikácii s predplatným Štandard alebo Klub. Predplatné Mini umožňuje dočítať články len na webe.

Pri kúpe nového predplatného cez aplikáciu si môžete vybrať z dvoch možností:
- predplatné Štandard umožňuje čítanie všetkých článkov Denníka N v aplikácii
- predplatné Klub navyše umožňuje odomykanie neobmedzeného počtu článkov pre priateľov

Predplatné zakúpené cez aplikáciu sa automaticky obnovujú každý mesiac. Obnovovanie predplatného môžete kedykoľvek zrušiť v nastaveniach svojho konta v Appstore.

Po kúpe predplatného cez aplikáciu odporúčame aktivovať si aj webové predplatné Denníka N. Bez tohto kroku nebude možné využívať predplatné zakúpené v aplikácii na webe. Aplikácia ponúkne aktiváciu webového predplatného hneď po kúpe predplatného v aplikácii, prípadne je možné aktivovať ho dodatočne cez menu aplikácie. 

S akýmikoľvek otázkami alebo návrhmi nás, prosím, kontaktujte na aplikacia@dennikn.sk.

Podmienky spracovania osobných údajov:
https://dennikn.sk/podmienky-spracuvania-osobnych-udajov/

Všeobecné obchodné podmienky
https://dennikn.sk/vseobecne-obchodne-podmienky/

Prerábaj a zariaďuj svoj domov lacnejšie s mobilnou aplikáciou MERKURY MARKET!

Stiahni si zadarmo aplikáciu MERKURY MARKET, zaregistruj sa a čerpaj výhody z vernostného programu, ktorý Ti umožní využívanie atraktívnych zliav, letákových akcií a propagačných kupónov.

Naše motto "Prerábaj a zariaďuj lacnejšie!" nie je iba prázdnym reklamným sloganom. Každý deň ho uvádzame do života tým, že našim zákazníkom ponúkame najvýhodnejšie ceny a snažíme sa splniť aj tie ich najvyššie očakávania.

V našej ponuke nájdete vyše 55 tisíc produktov. Naši dodávatelia sú lídrami v oblastiach svojich činností. Náš tovar ponúkame ako individuálnym spotrebiteľom, tak aj zhotoviteľom a veľkoodberateľom.

RepairLog is your ultimate companion for keeping every repair and maintenance task in order. Whether it’s fixing a leaky faucet, painting a room, or replacing a window, the app helps you log every detail - from what was repaired to when, how much it cost, and who did the work. You can organize repairs by rooms or areas, attach notes and always have your home’s maintenance history at hand.

Planning future repairs is just as easy - simply set a date and RepairLog will remind you before the time comes, so you never forget an important task. You can also track your total spending and view clear statistics to understand where your budget goes. With a clean and intuitive interface, RepairLog makes it simple to stay on top of home care, reduce stress, and keep your space in perfect shape all year round.

NovelTime - Your Pocket Library for Reading Novels & Books! 

Transform every spare moment into a reading adventure with romance novels, love stories and fiction books at your fingertips. Perfect for coffee breaks, commutes, or any time you want to read novels online.

Romance & Fiction Book Collection
Discover romance novels, love stories, mystery books and short fiction from around the world. Read ebooks in various genres including romantic novels, adventure stories and more.

Multi-Language Reading
Break language barriers and read books from global authors. Novels and stories available in multiple languages.

Extensive Library
Many romance books and fiction novels available. Find your next favorite story to read online.

Comfortable Book Reader Experience
Carefully designed ebook reader for immersive novel reading. Adjust settings for your perfect reading comfort.

Whether you're a romance novel enthusiast or just discovering the joy of reading books online, NovelTime transforms your moments into enriching reading experiences. Perfect for busy professionals, students, or anyone who loves reading stories and novels.

Romance novels, fiction books, stories to read. NovelTime, your pocket novel reader and ebook library.

Download now and begin reading novels online - where every moment becomes a gateway to amazing romance stories, fiction books and unforgettable characters!

Privacy Policy: https://www.noveltime.com/privacy-policy.html
User Agreement: https://www.noveltime.com/terms-of-service.html
LICENSED APPLICATION END USER LICENSE AGREEMENT: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Najčítanejšie spravodajstvo na slovenskom internete v praktickej aplikácii. SME.sk pre iPhone, iPad a Apple Watch vám ponúka rýchly prehľad o tom, čo sa deje na Slovensku a vo svete.

Najdôležitejšie a najnovšie správy zo SME.sk číta takmer dva a pol milióna ľudí na Slovensku, s aplikáciou SME.sk vám nič dôležité neunikne. Budete v obraze vďaka rýchlemu notifikačnému servisu a prehľadnému obsahu správ.

Aplikácia obsahuje články zo sekcií: Z domova, Zo zahraničia, Komentáre, Ekonomika, Kultúra, Šport, Auto, Tech a veda, Primár, Žena, Cestovanie, SME Plus, Fičí a aj anglické správy Slovak Spectator.

Čo všetko v aplikácii nájdete:
- Najčítanejšie správy za 4 a 24 hodín, 3 a 7 dní
- Rýchle notifikácie o aktuálnych udalostiach
- Vyhľadávanie obsahu na SME.sk
- Aktuálne spravodajské a publicistické videá TV SME
- Najnovšie články blogerov zo služby Blog SME
- Podcasty SME
- Rozhovory SME
- Správy z vášho regiónu (Bratislava, MY regióny, Korzár)
- Diskusie k článkom
- Lokalizovaná predpoveď počasia v menu
- Ukladanie článkov na neskoršie čítanie
- Widget s najnovšími článkami, dátumom a meninami

Možnosť predplatiť si prémiový obsah SME.sk:
• prémium bez reklamy za 8,99 €
• prémium za 6,99 €
• štandard za 4,49 €

Predplatné zakúpené v aplikácii platí aj na webe a môžete ho používať (neplatí pre nezobrazovanie reklamy).

Platba vám bude účtovaná na váš účet Apple pri potvrdení nákupu. Predplatné sa automaticky obnovuje, pokiaľ automatické obnovenie nevypnete minimálne 24 hodín pred koncom aktuálneho obdobia.

Vaše predplatné si môžete spravovať v účte Apple. Automatické obnovenie môžete vypnúť tým, že po zakúpení prejdete do svojho nastavenia účtu Apple. Akákoľvek nepoužitá časť bezplatnej skúšobnej doby, ak je ponúknutá, prepadne, keď si zakúpite predplatné tohto média.

Ochrana osobných údajov: https://www.sme.sk/dok/20455056/zasady-nakladania-s-osobnymi-udajmi-uzivatelov/

Všeobecné obchodné podmienky sú na adrese: https://www.sme.sk/c/7816641/pravidla-pouzivania-aplikacie-smesk.html

Get all your news in one place on an eye-opening platform that shows you the bias, reliability and ownership of every source you read. Cut through the noise and escape media echo chambers with Ground News.

Ground News is the largest news aggregator in the world with over 50K news sources and 60K articles added daily. But we aren’t a typical news aggregator, throwing hundreds of headlines at you that barely skim the surface. Ground frees people from algorithmic restraints, illuminates blindspots and makes media bias explicit with our one-of-a-kind media analysis features.

AVOID MANIPULATIVE ALGORITHMS
SPOT MEDIA  BIAS
DISCOVER BLINDSPOTS
CHECK THE RELIABILITY OF SOURCES
SEE WHO OWNS THE NEWS YOU CONSUME

Read daily breaking stories from sources around the world, in real time. Like a modern day newspaper, we show you diverse stories instead of algorithm-driven content that can limit your worldview. News coverage is rarely unbiased, so we give you as much context as possible so you can come to your own conclusions. Compare coverage on partisan topics like politics, and elections.

Enjoy our free features, or subscribe for in-depth analysis that will transform the way you look at news.


About Your Ground News Subscription: 
Subscriptions renew monthly and can be managed through your App Store account
Payment will be charged to your App Store Account on confirmation of purchase
Renewal is automatic unless turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
Subscriptions can also be managed through Ground News by going to your Account Settings after purchase 

See full terms and conditions here: https://ground.news/terms-and-conditions

Daily News UK: Breaking Alerts – Stay Informed with Live Updates & Top Stories

Stay ahead with real-time updates, breaking alerts, and top stories from reliable sources. Whether it’s local headlines or global events, Daily News UK: Breaking Alerts brings you the latest across politics, business, technology, sports, and entertainment—all in one place!

Key Features
Breaking News in Real-Time
Receive instant notifications for breaking news, critical updates, and must-know events happening locally and worldwide.

Top News Sources in One App
Access headlines from the most trusted news outlets. From local updates to global perspectives, find all your news in one app.

Trending Stories & Viral News
Explore trending topics and viral stories making waves across the web and social media.

Personalized News Feed
Customize your feed by choosing categories and topics that interest you. Whether it’s politics, lifestyle, or technology, it’s all about what matters most to you.

Simple & Seamless Interface
Enjoy a user-friendly design that makes browsing news, switching categories, and finding updates effortless.

Multi-Language Support
Stay comfortable reading in your preferred language, with support for over 30 languages.

Global & Local Coverage
Stay on top of local headlines and major global events with news from over 50 countries.

Why Choose Daily News UK: Breaking Alerts?
Real-Time Notifications: Instant alerts to keep you informed.
Comprehensive Coverage: Local, regional, and global news in one app.
Trending Topics: Discover stories that matter and are widely discussed.
Customizable Feeds: Get updates tailored to your interests.
Intuitive Design: Navigate quickly and easily.
How to Get Started:
Download and install the app on your device.
Choose your favorite categories to personalize your feed.
Enable notifications to stay updated on breaking news.
Browse updates from trusted sources anytime, anywhere.
Stay Ahead with Daily News UK: Breaking Alerts
From breaking headlines to trending stories, Daily News UK: Breaking Alerts ensures you’re always informed. Customize your news feed, receive real-time updates, and never miss a story again.

Download Daily News UK: Breaking Alerts Now and Stay Informed!

Discover original reporting and understand the events shaping the world in The New York Times app. Follow breaking news and get live updates. Watch news videos that provide context on top stories. Listen to news podcasts, culture podcasts, narrated articles and more. Access a range of coverage for the U.S., Australia and the world, including investigations, cultural commentary and analysis.


Download the app to enjoy all of The Times, all in one place: breaking news and in-depth reporting, plus games, recipes, audio journalism, product reviews, sports coverage and more.



BREAKING NEWS AND LIVE UPDATES
- Push notifications deliver the latest headlines and developing stories as they happen.
- Your daily news app that helps you stay informed as news breaks.
- Add widgets and custom alerts to keep up with the latest Australian and world news.

ORIGINAL REPORTING AND IN-DEPTH ANALYSIS
- Read, watch and listen to investigative reporting and insights.
- Access global news from 1,700 Times journalists reporting from 150 countries.
- Explore complex stories brought to life through data and visual journalism.

NEWS VIDEOS
- Watch videos featuring reporters, critics and other experts.
- Get closer to the story with videos across news and culture.
- Understand breaking news, top stories, culture reporting and more, in video.

INFORMED AUDIO NEWS
- Listen to a variety of audio journalism, including podcasts and narrated articles.
- Tune in to daily podcasts like “The Daily” and “The Headlines.”

ARTS, SCIENCE, TECHNOLOGY AND LIFESTYLE COVERAGE
- Discover reporting across arts, culture, fashion, travel and more.
- Stay informed on topics like technology, science and health.
- Explore culture with podcasts like “Modern Love” and “The Interview.”

SAVE, FOLLOW AND PERSONALIZE
- Easily save and access articles on topics you care about.
- See what’s new for you with personalized recommendations based on your tastes and reading history.

WORD, VISUAL AND NUMBER GAMES
- Unwind with daily games like the Crossword, Wordle, Connections, the Mini, Spelling Bee and Sudoku.

INSPIRING RECIPES
- Explore recipe ideas for easy weeknight dinners, holiday showstoppers and more.

COMMUNITY CONVERSATIONS
- Engage with Times reporters and readers in our moderated comments section. 
- Subscribers can share 10 articles per month with anyone.

DIGITAL SUBSCRIPTIONS
Enjoy everything we offer with a New York Times All Access subscription, which includes unlimited access to:
— Investigations, culture and analysis from News
— Word, visual and number puzzles from Games
— Recipes, videos, advice and inspiration from Cooking
— Independent product reviews from Wirecutter
— In-depth, personalized sports coverage from The Athletic

BY DOWNLOADING THE NEW YORK TIMES APP, you agree to:
• The automatic renewal terms stated above.
• The New York Times Privacy Policy: https://www.nytimes.com/privacy/privacy-policy
• The New York Times Cookie Policy: https://www.nytimes.com/privacy/cookie-policy
• The New York Times California Privacy Notices: http://www.nytimes.com/privacy/california-notice
• The New York Times Terms of Service: https://www.nytimes.com/content/help/rights/terms/terms-of-service.html

* Promotional offers for new subscribers only. Prices shown are in U.S. dollars. Other restrictions apply.

HappyMood – Discover Games Made for You

Are you a true gamer looking for one place to explore everything about games? HappyMoods is your ultimate companion! With a huge database of games, you can easily search, discover, and enjoy all the details you need in one simple app.
Explore a Massive Library HappyMood Browse through a wide range of games across different styles and categories. Whether you love action, adventure, puzzle, or strategy, HappyMods brings everything together in one place.
Watch Trailers & Gameplay Before playing, get a real taste of the game! Watch trailers and gameplay videos to see exactly what the game looks like.
Save Your Favorites HappyMood Build your own personalized collection of favorite games. Add the ones you love and come back to them anytime.
Track Games You Like Never lose track of a game again. Follow the games you’re interested in and keep them organized in your list.
Choose Your Mood Not sure what to play? Select your mood and HappyMod will recommend games that match how you feel at that moment. Fun, relaxing, scary, or exciting – there’s always a game waiting for you.
Test Your Knowledge Think you know everything about games? Try our quiz and challenge yourself with fun questions to see how much of a gaming expert you are.
All-in-One Gaming Experience HappyMood makes it easy for you to discover new games, keep track of your favorites, enjoy videos, and even test your knowledge. It’s everything a gamer needs – simple, clear, and always fun.
With HappyMod, finding the perfect game has never been easier.

The world is complex, and changing fast. The Economist app unlocks independent reporting and news analysis from correspondents across the globe. With articles, podcasts, videos and more, our app is a simple way to understand big news developments and why they matter.

Now introducing The Economist Insider, a premium video offering available at launch for subscribers to The Economist. Join senior editors as they explain what's happening now—and what comes next.

What does The Economist cover?

With expert journalists around the world, The Economist reports on politics in America and around the world, as well as economics, business, science, technology and more. We connect the dots to explain the news today and implications for tomorrow.

Why choose The Economist app?

- Read global, fact-checked news reporting anywhere
- Listen to award-winning podcasts and audio articles
- Watch videos that distill big news 

Get access to independent news reporting on your terms:

- Catch up on the news quickly with The World in Brief 
- Enjoy early access to weekly edition, ahead of print
- Download articles for offline reading

Play news games to test your knowledge:

- Mini crossword: The Economist’s wordplay news puzzle
- Dateline history quiz: guess when news extracts were published 
- Pint-sized news quiz: have you been following the latest headlines?

Enjoy additional features:

- Bookmark news articles to read later
- Give news articles to friends and family
- Read news analysis easily with adjustable text size
- Toggle dark mode

See what The Economist subscribers say:

“Great app, excellent journalism! The Economist is wonderful. The content is interesting and relevant and the reporting is superlative. Equally impressive is the drive to stay relevant by presenting media in multiple formats, from print to podcasts and short videos.”

“Impeccable journalism with an app to match. The Economist doesn’t need my endorsement of the quality of their journalism. It speaks for itself. Rather, I’ll comment that their app is well-designed and refreshing to use…I love being able to easily download entire editions, listen to articles with real narrators and search for past articles.”

Full terms of use: https://www.economist.com/legal/terms-of-use
Our privacy policy: https://www.economist.com/privacy

Relax and dive into a great story! Enjoy our bestselling series! Millions of readers can’t get enough of our library of unputdownable novels. Dive into an extensive collection of audiobooks, ebook novels, and immersive fiction stories. New chapters and interactive stories are added every day.

BINGE-READ / SNACK-READ
* Unstoppable addictive stories span multiple seasons, and new chapters released daily!
* 15 minutes per chapter, read at your own pace, whenever wherever you are, any time you want.

A LIBRARY FOR EVERY DESIRE
* Fall in love with our epic novels and unlimited fiction series.
* 400 ebooks to choose from, featuring chat fiction and other immersive elements
* Exclusive online novels from best-selling authors
* Follow your favorite books and writers as we craft a never-ending story.

A REVOLUTIONARY READING EXPERIENCE
* More immersive, interactive, and engaging than a traditional book.
* Turn on/off music, ambiance, and sound effects.
* Watch your favorite characters' conversation unfold in text messages too!
* Offline reading anytime, anywhere.

STORIES IN BOTH BOOK/AUDIOBOOK FORMATS
* Read or Listen? Whatever your mood and the situation calls for.
* Enjoy stories anywhere, any time.

BOOK CLUB
* Join the discussion online with our vibrant Book Club community
* Join our Facebook group: https://bit.ly/3j9af5g
* Follow us on Instagram: @galatea.stories

DARK MODE / NIGHT READING
* Turn on the Dark Mode for cozy night reading

HELP SUPPORT INDEPENDENT WRITERS
* Support Galatea writers by purchasing chapters.
* For unlimited access to all of our stories, we have subscription packages!

LANGUAGES
* English, German, French, Spanish, Russian, and Portuguese… more on the way.

The immersive reading app Galatea was developed by Inkitt (Free Novels Inc.)
By using Galatea, you agree to our Terms of Use and Community Guidelines (https://getgalatea.com/terms/) and to our Privacy Policy (https://getgalatea.com/privacy)

Got a growing TBR list? See great book recommendations, but forget them later? Meet TBR Bookshelf!

Easily track books you want to read, are currently reading, or have finished with no limits. Rate and review books once you’ve read them and log your favorite moments using our quick and intuitive rating system. Browse public ratings to see a book’s POV, tropes, reread rate, and up to four genre-specific ratings. For example, Romance tracks Spice, Fluff, Humor, and Tear. All ratings are anonymous, so you can be honest with your reviews.

Within our rating system, you can log:
* Reading format
* 5 Star Rating including half stars
* Up to four genre ratings
* If you would reread a book
* DNF (Did Not Finish)
* Favorite characters and quotes
* Series and standalone books
* Pro quotes and annotations (Paid Subscription Required)
* Any additional thoughts about the book
Celebrate your reading milestones with special book confetti and earn stickers for completing books and certain book tropes.
Exclusive Pro features include:
* Book tropes
* Book playlists to track songs (cannot be played within the app)
* POV format and amount
* TV show and movie adaptation ratings
* Four seasonal ratings
All users can create custom yearly reading goals. When you finish a book, it is automatically added to your yearly reading goal bookshelf. Pro users can also fully customize their bookshelves with color themes, bookshelf items, and layouts.

TBR Bookshelf makes managing your TBR list fun, easy, and satisfying. Track books, set reading goals, log quotes, and discover new reads all in one place. With customizable shelves, anonymous ratings, and a supportive community, staying on top of your reading has never been more enjoyable.

Join TBR Bookshelf, a woman-owned and operated company, BookTok’s favorite, and trusted by millions of readers.

TBR Bookshelf is free to download and use. No account or sign-up is required. TBR Bookshelf Pro includes a 7-day free trial and then options for a monthly plan ($4.99), a 6-month plan ($19.99), or a yearly plan ($29.99). All other features remain free indefinitely.

A subscription will be applied to your iTunes account at the end of your free trial. Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can cancel anytime in your iTunes account settings. Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription.

These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary.

Note: This app is for tracking your reading journey. Reading is not available within the app.

Privacy Policy: http://jordanpetersonstudio.com/tbr-bookshelf-privacy-policy/ Terms of Service: http://jordanpetersonstudio.com/tbr-bookshelf-terms-of-service/

Všetky funkcionality ako na webe, no s veľkou výhodou upozornení (push notifikáciami) a novou funkcionalitou – Feedom.

Feed
Zaži to najlepšie z dvoch svetov v našom novom Feede! Teraz môžeš objaviť články zoradené chronologicky a jednoducho filtrovať medzi lifestylom a spravodajstvom. Či už ťa zaujíma najnovší módny trend, alebo aktuálne svetové udalosti, všetko máš na dosah ruky.

Stále aktuálne a personalizované
Naším cieľom je priniesť ti aktuálne informácie presne podľa tvojich preferencií. S našimi push notifikáciami môžeš očakávať okamžité upozornenia na to, čo ťa zaujíma. Od najnovších udalostí po tvoje sledované témy a kľúčové slová – nevyhne sa ti nič dôležité.

Skvelé benefity na dosah ruky
Okrem informácií ti ponúkame prístup k Refresher Benefitom, kde môžeš objaviť skvelé zľavy a ponuky zo sveta životného štýlu. Či už ide o exkluzívne akcie, alebo špeciálne výhody pre našich verných používateľov, všetko to nájdeš priamo v aplikácii.

Ulož si svoj obľúbený obsah
Máš články, ktoré chceš čítať znova a znova? Teraz môžeš jedným klikom uložiť svoj obľúbený obsah a mať ho kedykoľvek pripravený na čítanie.

Nočný režim pre pohodlné čítanie
Naše oči majú aj vo večerných hodinách záujem o komfortné čítanie. Preto sme pridali nočný (tmavý) režim, ktorý ti umožní pohodlné prehliadanie obsahu aj za neskorej noci.

Máš nejaké otázky, nápady na vylepšenie alebo si narazil na nejaký problém? Nezúfaj! Stačí nám napísať na email: support(zavináč)refresher.sk. Tvoj hlas je pre nás dôležitý a radi ho vypočujeme!

Stiahni si aplikáciu „Refresher” ešte dnes a začni svoju cestu za poznaním, inšpiráciou a moderným životným štýlom!

Stay ahead of breaking news in politics, sport and culture. Explore a range of tools and advice, from building your wealth to looking after your health. Keep your ear to the ground with Telegraph Podcasts, including the latest news from Ukraine, gripping investigations and the inside scoop on today’s biggest talking points. And train your brain with Telegraph Puzzles, like Sudoku, PlusWord, Panagram, Sorted and the Cryptic Crossword. 

Not yet a Telegraph Subscriber? Download the app now to try 14 days free – no payment details required. 

Follow the latest breaking news

Stay ahead of the stories shaping our world, from News and Business to Politics and Sport. Visit the Latest section for breaking news headlines, as they unfold in the UK, US and around the world. Or tap Home to scroll through the day’s biggest stories, with live blogs, videos and photo galleries, plus free-thinking comment and in-depth analysis.

Expert advice

Make the best decisions for you and your family. Whether you’re managing your money, looking after your health, planning your next holiday or searching for the perfect school or university, you’ll find a range of practical, valuable advice from names you can trust.
See how the latest news affects your plans – and learn how to turn it to your advantage. You’ll also find a wide range of useful tools and guides, to help you plan your next step with confidence.

Read the daily digital newspaper

Enjoy the digital editions of The Daily Telegraph and Sunday Telegraph anytime, anywhere. They're just like the printed editions of the newspaper, including all your favourite sections, supplements and magazines, like Telegraph Magazine.

Every day’s edition of the newspaper is available from 5am. What's more, once you've downloaded your newspaper, you can browse it online or offline. So whether you’re travelling to work, need some food for thought over lunch, or you’re just relaxing at home, you’ll be able to read the full range of our unrivalled insight, expert tips and in-depth long reads.

Stay ahead

Set up notifications and never miss a moment, whether it’s a breaking news story, a major sporting event, the latest updates in business and finance, a must-read interview or opinion from your favourite journalists.

Listen to podcasts

Visit our Podcast Centre for a widely acclaimed range of audio-journalism. Listen to Ukraine: The Latest, get the inside track on the news in The Daily T, tune in to Planet Normal or listen to a gripping investigation, like Bed of Lies.

Read subscriber-only newsletters

Enjoy more from your favourite Telegraph journalists. Read a selection of their subscriber-only newsletters.

Newsletters in the app include Matt’s weekly newsletter, Your Royal Appointment, Investor and Beyond Brexit Bulletin.

Play Telegraph Puzzles

Boost your mood and your brain power, wherever life takes you. Play games like the Mini Crossword, PlusWord, Panagram, Killer Sudoku and the Cryptic Crossword.

Don’t have a Puzzles Subscription? Worry not, upgrading your access is quick and simple.

N.B.
- Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
- Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period
- Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period
- You can manage your subscription and switch off the auto-renewal by accessing your Apple ID after purchase

• Čtení na každý den. V aplikaci najdete veškeré aktuální texty jako na webu Respekt. Stejně tak archiv vydání včetně speciálů Respektu.
• Pondělní vydání Respektu si můžete číst s předstihem už v neděli ve 12 hodin.
• Můžete také poslouchat audioverze (nově všech) textů a podcasty.
• Články můžete sdílet, jak jste ve svém zařízení zvyklí. Také si je můžete ukládat do záložek, které jsou synchronizované s vašimi uloženými články na webu Respektu.
• Aplikace nabízí noční režim. Samozřejmostí je zvětšování/zmenšování písma.

••••
An iPad and iPhone version of the Respekt magazine.
Czech language only.
••••

--
Respekt je možné kupovat po jednotlivých vydáních, anebo prostřednictvím předplatného. Předplatit časopis je možné na jeden měsíc nebo na jeden rok.

Ceny za jednotlivá čísla i předplatné jsou uvedeny na formuláři při nákupu. Platba je vždy odepsána ihned po potvrzení nákupu z účtu iTunes prostřednictvím platební metody zadané uživatelem na účtu iTunes.

Roční i měsíční předplatné se vždy automaticky obnovuje, pokud automatické obnovení nevypnete nejpozději 24 hodin před vypršením předplatného.

Platba za automatické obnovení bude odepsána z účtu iTunes vždy 24 hodin před vypršením předplatného, a to za stejnou cenu jako při původní platbě.
Automatické prodlužování předplatného můžete vypnout v nastavení uživatelského účtu ihned po nákupu předplatného. Předplatné není možné zrušit během doby jeho trvání.

Podmínky používání a nakládání s osobními údaji jsou dostupné na webu Respektu. 
Podmínky Apple jsou dostupné na https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Editoři Deníku N sledují aktuální dění, čtou za vás zpravodajské agentury a weby, kontrolují sociální sítě a vybírají pro vás jen ty důležité a zajímavé zprávy a informace. Každý den zveřejní alespoň stovku novinek doplněných odkazy, grafy, obrázky nebo videozáznamy. A v případě mimořádných zpráv nabídnou ještě více.

Aplikace kromě toho nabízí:
- Zprávy přímo v notifikacích dle vašeho výběru
- Režim se sportem, nebo bez
- Noční režim a zvětšování písma
- Ukládání článků na později

Aplikace je zdarma.

Created by Min:60 
www.min60.com

Peech – Turn Anything Into Audiobooks!

Meet Peech, your personal AI-powered reading sidekick that transforms all your text - PDFs, web articles, physical books, and more - into crystal-clear audiobooks. Whether you’re racing through study notes, catching up on blog posts, or diving into that spicy new novel, Peech has you covered.

The Magic of AI Voices
	• Smart Voice Matching: Peech’s advanced AI picks the perfect voice for each genre - whether it’s serious academic reading or a lighthearted romance.
	• Natural & Lifelike: Our voices are so real, you might forget you’re listening to an app.

Effortless Content Scanning
	• Lightning-Fast OCR: Snap a pic of any page or book, and Peech instantly converts it to audio. No more manual typing!
	• Web & PDF Parsing: Just paste a link or upload a file to start listening - perfect for busy pros, students, and anyone who prefers ears over eyes.

Speedy Reading, On-the-Go
	• High-Speed Playback: Devour your favorite content up to 5x faster - perfect for power-learners or those who want to binge-listen on the run.
	• Playlists & Autoplay: Build custom playlists to keep the stories rolling, so you can multitask like a boss.

One App, All Languages
	• Automatic Language Detection: Peech seamlessly identifies and narrates in 60+ languages.
	• Global Accessibility: Great for language learners, busy professionals, and anyone with reading challenges.

Why Peech?
	• Students: Turn textbooks into engaging audio lectures - study smarter, not harder.
	• Busy Professionals: Catch up on news, memos, or trade articles during your commute.
	• Accessibility: An empowering reading solution for users with visual or reading impairments.
	• Content Lovers: From classics to your favorite steamy novels - Peech reads it all.

Free Trials & Subscriptions

Experience Peech with our flexible subscription plans, some offering free trials. Dive into unlimited content and see how Peech revolutionizes your reading routine - no commitment, no hassle.

Ready to transform your reading life? Give Peech a try and unlock the power of AI-driven audio today!

TREND je ekonomický týždenník o podnikaní a podnikateľoch na Slovensku, podporuje slobodný trh a správne hospodárske reformy. Snaží sa o nestrannú a vecnú analýzu slovenskej i svetovej ekonomiky, biznisu a financií. Vyhýba sa emóciám, rozoberá fakty a trendy. Vo voľnom predaji je každý štvrtok, vydania na stiahnutie do iOS aplikácie sú k dispozícii už od stredajšieho popoludnia. 
TREND na stiahnutie do aplikácie si môžete kúpiť priamo v nej*:
- Jedno vydanie za 2,69 €
- Ročné predplatné za 74,99 € alebo na polročné za 44,99 €, počas trvania predplatného získate aj prístup do archívu od čísla 1/2011

Alebo priamo u vydavateľa:
- Predplatitelia TRENDU priamo u vydavateľa majú všetky digitálne služby v cene. Stačí ak sa zaregistrujú na TREND.sk a vydania vrátane archívnych si do tabletu môžu sťahovať bezplatne. Meno a heslo z webu fungujú aj v aplikácii.

* Platba bude uhradená z vášho iTunes účtu. Predplatné sa automaticky obnovuje, čo znamená, že bude automaticky predĺžené po vypršaní jeho platnosti. Vždy môžete zrušiť nasledujúce predĺženie predplatného najneskôr 24 hodín pred koncom prebiehajúceho predplatného obdobia.

Bližšie informácie o ochrane osobných údajov nájdete na https://www.coverpageapp.com/policy
a o podmienkach používania na https://www.coverpageapp.com/terms

Prípadné pripomienky k aplikácii nám zasielajte na adresu etrend@trend.sk.

Get fearless, independent journalism with the Guardian app. Never miss breaking news, dive into diverse opinion pieces, and follow stories minute-by-minute with our dynamic live blogs - from world news and politics to business and sport. Get the following app exclusive features:

My Guardian - Your own custom feed of your favourite topics and writers, so you can follow the stories you care most about. 

Puzzles - Whether you're looking for classics like Soduku and Crosswords, or fun word games like Wordiply and Word wheel, we have the puzzle for you. 

Podcasts - Listen to our award-winning podcasts directly in the Guardian app. 
 
Listen to Articles - Can't read our articles? Listen to them instead. You can get realistic audio transcription of every article we publish - excluding live blogs. 

The Guardian news app is free to download and offers you a beautiful, intuitive mobile experience – so you can read, watch and listen to our independent reporting whenever and wherever it suits you. Readers have a limited number of articles, which refreshes on a regular basis. If you’re a regular reader, you might consider subscribing. Subscribing gives you full access to Guardian articles in our app, so you can read quality, international journalism with no restrictions.

And, when you subscribe, you’ll unlock:

Unlimited reading in the app, with no subscription messages
Ad-free reading, for an uninterrupted experience
Offline reading – download articles to explore on the go

What’s more, subscribing to our news app is a great way to show your support for fearless, independent Guardian journalism. As a reader-funded news organisation, we rely on your funding to power our future. Thank you.

KTool.io: Send web articles, newsletters and RSS to Kindle. Build a reading habit with KTool today!

You spend too much time on computer screens. It damages our eyesight and hurts our comprehension.

KTool helps you read everything on Kindle instead.

Less eyestrain. More focus 

———

H O W    T O    U S E

Installing this app will add a KTool Share Target to your mobile phone. Share articles with KTool Share Target to read them on your Kindle.

Send long web articles to your Kindle to read later. Read anywhere: on your Kindle e-reader or the Kindle app on your smartphone (any platform). Articles are available for offline reading once delivered to the Kindle.

———

F E A T U R E S

— New: Send documents to Kindle (PDF, DOCX and EPUB)
— Add articles to Daily Read or Weekly Read
— Read newsletter on Kindle
— Send Wikipedia articles to Kindle
— Send Hacker News discussions to Kindle
— Dark Mode

— Speedy delivery to your Kindle
— Support articles behind paywalls
— Image support
— Emoji support
— Keyboard short-cut support
— Read Twitter threads on Kindle
— Read RSS on Kindle (WIP)

KTool can send to the following devices:

—  Kindle e-readers sold by Amazon
—  iPhone/iPad Kindle app
—  Kindle app on other platforms

———

T E S T    D R I V E

You can test KTool's functionality without install the plugin by using this web portal: https://ktool.io/read-on-kindle

Example articles:

1. The saddest “just ship it” story (2020)
https://kitze.io/posts/saddest-just-ship-it-story-ever

2. Substack’s Ideology
https://every.to/divinations/substack-s-ideology

———

C O N T A C T

KTool: https://ktool.io
Support: daniel (at) podzim.co
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ktool_io

———

P R I V A C Y

This extension does not do anything unless you click the Send to Kindle button. We do not monitor or inject any scripts into your pages while you browse.

When you click the Kindle icon, this extension sends the contents of the page and its URL to the KTool service. The KTool service then packages the contents into a reader-ready format and delivers it to your Kindle.

Content which you process with the KTool service will be cached on the server for a short period.

More information on our privacy page: https://ktool.io/privacy. Feel free to contact us if you have any questions.

T E R M S  O F  U S E
